web_creation.title: Custom Website Creation
web_creation.subtitle: Website Creation – From A to Z
web_creation.description: Transform your vision into digital reality with our full expertise in web development. We create modern, fast, and Google-optimized websites. From UX/UI design to launch, every project is custom-built with the latest technologies (React, Next.js, Tailwind CSS). Get a professional site that converts visitors into clients and boosts your revenue from the first month.

web_redesign.title: Website Redesign
web_redesign.description: Is your current website not generating enough sales? Our redesign service turns your online presence into a conversion machine. We analyze your conversion rate, optimize user experience, and modernize the design to double your results. Mobile-first interface, optimized loading speed, smooth user journey – everything is designed to maximize your revenue and reduce bounce rate by 40%.

seo_optimization.title: SEO & Visibility Optimization
seo_optimization.description: Dominate Google's first page and multiply your organic traffic by 5 in 6 months. Our complete SEO strategy includes: in-depth technical audit, on-page optimization, optimized content creation, quality link building, and performance tracking. We target profitable keywords in your sector to attract qualified prospects.

maintenance.title: Maintenance & Technical Support
maintenance.description: Protect your digital investment with our premium maintenance service. Enhanced security, automatic backups, regular updates,24/7 monitoring, and priority support. We guarantee 99.9% uptime and response time under 2h. Avoid costly outages and focus on your business while we keep your site in perfect working order.

what_we_do.question: What services do you offer?
what_we_do.answer: We offer comprehensive digital solutions including web development, mobile app development, digital marketing, and technology consulting.

timeline.question: How long does a typical project take?
timeline.answer: Project timelines vary depending on scope and complexity. A simple website typically takes 4-6 weeks, while complex applications may take 3-6 months. We also offer a rapid 14-day development option.

pricing_model.question: How do you structure your pricing?
pricing_model.answer: We offer flexible pricing models including fixed-price projects, hourly rates, and retainer agreements based on your specific needs.

support_included.question: Is ongoing support included?
support_included.answer: Yes, we provide ongoing support and maintenance packages to ensure your digital solutions continue to perform optimally.

technologies.question: What technologies do you use?
technologies.answer: We use modern technologies including React, Next.js, Node.js, and cloud platforms like Vercel.

consultation.question: Do you offer free consultations?
consultation.answer: Yes, we offer a free initial consultation to discuss your project requirements and provide strategic recommendations.

faq.title: Restaurant Website FAQ - Your Questions Answered
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about creating a professional restaurant website

questions.question: How much does a restaurant website cost?
questions.answer: Our restaurant websites start from €799 incl. VAT for a complete solution with online reservations, digital menu, and mobile optimization. Professional package €1299 includes online sales + Click&Collect. Monthly support plans from €24/month include hosting, maintenance, and all technical updates. No hidden fees, transparent pricing. Delivery 3-8 weeks depending on complexity.

questions.question: Do I need technical knowledge to manage my restaurant website?
questions.answer: Absolutely not! We handle all technical aspects - hosting, security, updates, backups. With our monthly support plans, you get a dedicated team managing everything. You focus on your restaurant, we handle the website.

questions.question: How long does it take to build a restaurant website?
questions.answer: 4-6 weeks for a complete restaurant website with online reservations and ordering system. We provide weekly updates and you can track progress in real-time. Rush delivery available in 2-3 weeks for urgent projects.

questions.question: Can customers make reservations and order food online?
questions.answer: Yes! All our restaurant websites include automatic online reservations (24/7), takeaway/delivery ordering system with payment processing, and customer management. No commissions - you keep 100% of sales unlike UberEats (30% commission).

questions.question: Will my restaurant website work on mobile phones?
questions.answer: Absolutely! 85% of restaurant customers search on mobile. Your website will be perfectly optimized for smartphones, tablets, and desktops. Mobile-first design ensures fast loading and easy navigation for hungry customers.

questions.question: What's included in monthly support plans?
questions.answer: Everything technical is handled by our team: premium hosting, daily backups, security updates, menu modifications, price changes, photo updates, SEO optimization, Google reviews management, and priority support. You never worry about technical issues again.

questions.question: Can I update my menu and prices myself?
questions.answer: Yes, with our simple admin panel! But with monthly support plans, our team can handle all updates for you - menu changes, new dishes, seasonal specials, price adjustments. Choose self-service or full-service management.

questions.question: How will customers find my restaurant online?
questions.answer: We optimize for local SEO: Google My Business integration, local directory listings, 'restaurants near me' searches, Google Maps visibility. Your restaurant will appear when hungry customers search in your area.

questions.question: Do you charge commissions on online orders?
questions.answer: Zero commissions! Unlike delivery platforms (UberEats 30%, DoorDash 25%), you keep 100% of your sales. Only standard payment processing fees apply (1.4%). Your profits stay in your pocket.

questions.question: What if I need changes or new features later?
questions.answer: With monthly support plans, minor modifications are included. Need major changes? Our development team handles everything - new features, design updates, additional pages. Technical implementation is our specialty, not yours.

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about creating your website

questions.question: What is the price of a website for my bakery?
questions.answer: Our prices start at €899 for a showcase website and go up to €2299 for a premium multilingual solution. We offer a free and personalized quote according to your specific needs.

questions.question: How long does it take to create my website?
questions.answer: The timeframe varies from 3 to 8 weeks depending on project complexity. A simple showcase website takes 3-4 weeks, while a complete e-commerce solution requires 5-6 weeks.

questions.question: Will my website be visible on Google?
questions.answer: Yes, absolutely! All our websites are optimized for local SEO. We ensure your bakery appears in Google Maps searches and local queries.

questions.question: Can I manage my website myself after delivery?
questions.answer: Yes, we use a simple and intuitive management system. We include complete training so you can update your products, prices and news independently.

questions.question: Will the website work on mobile?
questions.answer: All our websites are fully responsive, meaning they adapt perfectly to smartphones and tablets. Over 70% of your customers will view your website on mobile.

questions.question: Do you offer support after delivery?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer continuous technical support, security updates and assistance for all your questions. Maintenance packages available from €29/month.
